verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:30
verses.text: But Sihon king of Heshbon would not let us pass by him: for the Lord thy God hardened his spirit, and made his heart obstinate, that he might deliver him into thy hand, as appeareth this day.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:31
verses.text: And the Lord said unto me, Behold, I have begun to give Sihon and his land before thee: begin to possess, that thou mayest inherit his land.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:32
verses.text: Then Sihon came out against us, he and all his people, to fight at Jahaz.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:33
verses.text: And the Lord our God delivered him before us; and we smote him, and his sons, and all his people.
